document.full_text: a string of bombings killed at least 15 people and wounded 74 more across baghdad on sunday and two u.s. troops were killed in central iraq, officials said.
document.title: two u.s. troops killed as baghdad hit by bombs
lines_and_colors: a string of bombings killed at least 15 people and wounded 74 more across baghdad on sunday and two u.s. troops were killed in central iraq, officials said.
